name: Dino Hunter Pet: Attack Farm
description:
Dino Hunter Pet: Attack Farm is an open world game where you can hunt pet and fight with other dinosaurs. Take control of huge dino and hunt animals in the farm . Dinosaurs are carnivores animals hunt for food. If you are player of dinosaur games then must be play this new dinosaur fighting game. This is the best dinosaur game in the world. Control your angry dinosaur in a 3d environment to grow the dinosaur’s family in this dinosaur survive game.
Features
- Best Dino simulators game.
- Realistic & amazing graphics.
- Awesome gameplay.
- Enjoy jurassic environment of these dinosaur for free.
- Thrilling attacking animations in dinosaurs 3d
- Awesome gameplay with attacking animations.
